alert.note: Alert for Denton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 5:42PM CDT until September 19 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Denton County in north central Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 541 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Krum, or 8 miles west of Denton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Denton, Lewisville, Flower Mound, Coppell, Southlake, Corinth, Highland Village, Trophy Club, Lake Dallas, Roanoke, Krum, Argyle, Hickory Creek, Justin, Double Oak, Shady Shores, Northlake, Haslet, Bartonville, and Copper Canyon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
